name: The Good Demon
description:
A 2D rpg game. This is my very first game EVER and is still in development. You play a Demon who, despite being despised by most of the world, fights to protect the innocent. This game is in NO WAY complete and is only really a demo of what's to come. Enjoy!

To Play, extract the file, open the folder and double click game.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------UPDATES:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

03/09/2018:

Added shops, cut scenes, a quest with a dungeon and a final boss at the end that will drop a unique sword after defeating it. More weapons and armors to buy and use. The first town is now complete and fully explore-able. Inn set up with a sleep / rest mechanic. You can also now name your character!
